![](https://www.deepnetsolutions.com/images/logo.png)

We are currently running a sales on our DeepNet Solutions sub-brand! We are giving a 15% no-reccuring discount on all our yearly plans listed on [DeepNetSolutions.com](https://www.deepnetsolutions.com/openvz-vps.html)

The promo code is: **BD2A3RF8SVLJ**

**Please take note, all price below are in Canadian Dollars.**

<hr>

* 1 CPU Core
* 128 MB RAM // 64MB Swap
* 10 GB Storage
* 250 GB @ 1Gbps
* <del>13.00$/year</del> Now: 11.05$/year (~8.59 USD)

<hr> 

<pre>
Our OpenVZ are available in the following locations:

Montreal, Quebec, Canada (DDoS Mitigated)
New Jersey, Piscataway, USA (DDoS Mitigated)
Miami, Florida, USA (DDoS Mitigated)
Atlanta, Georgia, USA
Dallas, Texas, USA

Amsterdam, The Netherlands, Europe
London, United Kingdon, Europe
</pre>

<hr> 

N.B: DeepNet Solutions new VPS line up doesn't have SLA and is not intend to be use in production.  We suggest you to refer to our Premium OpenVZ from Gestion DBI for any production or critical service.

<hr> 

* All our VPS support TUN/TAP/PPP
* We accept TOR Relay on our Dedicated IPv4 VPS. Read AuP for more information
* We accept Paypal, Stripe and Bitcoin (via Bitpay)
* Looking Glass: https://www.deepnetsolutions.com/faq.html
* We speak French and English. You can reach us 24/7, via the following link: http://gdbi.pw/contact

Regards, David.
